description: DGC Member values engaging with academic institutions at the student or research level.
DGC Member values spreading, growing or diversifying Dijets community and engagement with general public.
DGC Member values compliance and regulation where appropriate and applicable for Dijets.
DGC Member values data availability and decision-making depending upon data at disposal.
DGC Member values decentralisation of Dijets, its Ecosystem and its Domains.
DGC Member values growth of Dijets and the adoption of its Ecosystem across a range of verticals.
DGC Member values innovation and creativity in problem-solving and direction.
DGC Member values the expansion and/or strategic partnerships of the Ecosystem onto/with other blockchains.
DGC Member values pragmatism and pragmatic solutions as responses to problems Dijets may face.
DGC Member values responsibility to DJTX holders and users that interact with Dijets and the Ecosystem.
DGC Member values increasing the revenue of the Ecosystem and expanding its usecases to new revenue streams.
DGC Member values risk management and risk analysis for Dijets.
DGC Member values scalability of Dijets and its Ecosystem
DGC Member values Dijets security when expanding and/or changing functional parameters of its protocol.
DGC Member values simplicity and comprehensibility when determining courses of action.
DGC Member values social and environmental sustainability as a direction for Dijets.
DGC Member values providing leadership, direction and vision for Dijets.
DGC Member values lobbying with government institutions and organisations for ecosystem's benefit.
